name: Razenroth 2
description:
Razenroth 2 is a dark action game with RPG and roguelike elements. Enter a randomly generated world of nightmares and fight with an army of dangerous monsters. With an extensive character development system and a large number of magical weapons, every game is unique.

The game is set a few years after the events of the first part. Razenroth, although defeated earlier, is still a huge threat. This time Charles Carter, the main character, has to get rid of him once and for all.

Main features:

  • Randomly generated levels in 5 separate sceneries. Additionally, a few secret locations to discover.

  • Dozens of magic weapons to find. The player can use, among others, the elements of fire, ice, wind, and lightning.

  • Many items to discover. Elements of armour, amulets, books, potions, magical artifacts, and many other things that will help you in battle.

  • 6 Playable characters. Two are available from the beginning. You can unlock the other four as you progress in the game.

  • Helpers. Pets with useful skills will help you in the fight. In addition, you can hire mercenaries who will fight by your side for a fee.

  • Advanced character development system. While earning experience, each character can develop their statistics by choosing from several available options. There are also talents that allow you to create a unique character, tailored to your preferences.

  • 60 achievements waiting to be unlocked.
